DOC.brief_summary: The main objectives of the study were - to compare the pharmacokinetics (PK) of Optivate速 and Haemate P速 in various types of vonWillebrand disease (VWD) using the results from the VWF: RCo, VWF:Ag, VWF:CBA and Factor VIII assays. - to compare the clinical tolerance and safety of these two treatments after single IV infusions in subjects with VWD.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Compare the Pharmacokinetics and Safety of Optivate速 and Haemate P速 in Patients With Von Willebrand Disease.
DOC.criteria: Previously treated subjects of at least 12 years of age, with any type of VWD were eligible for entry into this study.
